metadata.Title: CVE-2021-44716 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
net/http in Go before 1.16.12 and 1.17.x before 1.17.5 allows uncontrolledmemory consumption in the header canonicalization cache via HTTP/2requests.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-44716` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-golang-x-net-dev - 1:0.7.0+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-golang-x-net package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.7.0+dfsg-1').
google-guest-agent package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
